T04TD3936E:334a-1: bo dhi stva tsarya pra d'i pi ratna m'a l'i n'a ma /
T04TD3936E:334a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T04TD3936E:334a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3936E:334a-5: shes bya ma lus dag ni thugs chud cing //
T04TD3936E:334a-6: nyes pa'i dri ma dag ni drungs byung ba //
T04TD3936E:334a-7: phyogs bcu dag na dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
T04TD3936E:334a-8: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3936E:334a-9: spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma rin chen phreng ba gang //
T04TD3936E:334a-10: bdag gis dri med gsung dang bla ma'i gdams ngag la brten te //
T04TD3936E:334a-11: rab gsal bshad kyi rnam rtog rang dags min //
T04TD3936E:334a-12: rin chen rgyal po lta bu'i mi yi lus //
T04TD3936E:334a-13: rigs ldan dal 'byor thob nas ni //
T04TD3936E:334a-14: byams dang snying rje sngon 'gro bas //
T04TD3936E:334a-15: gzhi gsum yon tan dran byas te //
T04TD3936E:334a-16: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
T04TD3936E:334a-17: dang po skyabs su 'gro bar bya //
T04TD3936E:334a-18: ston pa gzhan la mi phyogs par //
T04TD3936E:334a-19: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas sku //
T04TD3936E:334a-20: dpal ldan skyes mchog mtshan 'chang ba //
T04TD3936E:334a-21: thob 'dod sangs rgyas skyabs song yin //
T04TD3936E:334a-22: 'jig rten skyabs med bskyab pa'i phyir //
T04TD3936E:334a-23: spyod cing rang gi don btang ste //
T04TD3936E:334a-24: sangs rgyas bsgrub phyir blo brtan na //
T04TD3936E:334a-25: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-0: rga shi nad dang 'chi ba @334b las ;
T04TD3936E:334b-1: / sems can bde phongs bskyab pa'i phyir //
T04TD3936E:334b-2: sangs rgyas nyid ni smon pa ni //
T04TD3936E:334b-3: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yis //
T04TD3936E:334b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod chen la //
T04TD3936E:334b-5: gang zhig spyod med zhum med cing //
T04TD3936E:334b-6: mos pa chen po skyed byed pa //
T04TD3936E:334b-7: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yis //
T04TD3936E:334b-8: byang chub mchog tu smon byed de //
T04TD3936E:334b-9: rang gi don la mi lta zhing //
T04TD3936E:334b-10: gzhan don brtson yang nga med na //
T04TD3936E:334b-11: sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-12: dam chos 'khor los sgyur ba yi //
T04TD3936E:334b-13: rgyal po thob ste 'chi med pa'i //
T04TD3936E:334b-14: lam gyis 'gro ba skyabs smon na //
T04TD3936E:334b-15: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-16: bdag dang 'jig rten mthong med kyang//
T04TD3936E:334b-17: 'jig rten yongs su mi gtong zhing //
T04TD3936E:334b-18: dam chos bsgrub par gar mos pa //
T04TD3936E:334b-19: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-20: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bya zhing //
T04TD3936E:334b-21: bdag gi dam chos brtan bya zhes //
T04TD3936E:334b-22: sems can don la sems mnyen na //
T04TD3936E:334b-23: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-24: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la //
T04TD3936E:334b-25: chos 'di skyabs kyi mchog yin zhes //
T04TD3936E:334b-26: rtog cing dam chos spyod byed na //
T04TD3936E:334b-27: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-28: dge bshes dam pa sten byed cing //
T04TD3936E:334b-29: nyan 'dod tshul bzhin du sems la //
T04TD3936E:334b-30: ston cing nan tan lhur len na //
T04TD3936E:334b-31: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-32: dam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir //
T04TD3936E:334b-33: spyod pa yang dag spyod byed cing //
T04TD3936E:334b-34: lus dang srog la mi lta na //
T04TD3936E:334b-35: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-36: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel ba //
T04TD3936E:334b-37: bdag don ma yin gzhan don du //
T04TD3936E:334b-38: snying rje chen pos spyod byed na //
T04TD3936E:334b-39: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-40: gang zhig bde la chags med la //
T04TD3936E:334b-41: sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi 'jigs shing //
T04TD3936E:334b-42: 'jig rten phan spyod don shes na //
T04TD3936E:334b-43: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-44: 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyang //
T04TD3936E:334b-45: bdag gi chos la dgod bya zhes //
T04TD3936E:334b-46: sems bskyed nan tan spyod byed na //
T04TD3936E:334b-47: chos la skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-48: mos pa shin tu brtan pa yis //
T04TD3936E:334b-49: rgyal sras mchog gi drung song ba //
T04TD3936E:334b-50: gang gi bsam pa mi bzlog pa //
T04TD3936E:334b-51: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-52: theg pa dman par gyur pa yi //
T04TD3936E:334b-53: nyan thos theg la gnas pa rnams //
T04TD3936E:334b-54: byang chub sems ni skyed byed na //
T04TD3936E:334b-55: dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:334b-56: dge 'dun yon tan dran bya zhing //
T04TD3936E:335a-2: sems can thams cad bkur mos na //
T04TD3936E:335a-3: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin //
T04TD3936E:335a-4: byang chub go cha brtan byed cing //
T04TD3936E:335a-5: dge 'dun rnams la yang dag mos //
T04TD3936E:335a-6: dge 'dun bsnyen bskur gang dad pa //
T04TD3936E:335a-7: dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin //
T04TD3936E:335a-8: dran dang shes bzhin bag yod na //
T04TD3936E:335a-9: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-10: dge 'dun yon tan rin chen gyis //
T04TD3936E:335a-11: sems can brgyan par byed pa dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-12: dge 'dun rnams la dad brtan pas //
T04TD3936E:335a-13: 'gro ba ma lus rnams kyis kyang //
T04TD3936E:335a-14: dad pa bzlog par mi nus na //
T04TD3936E:335a-15: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin //
T04TD3936E:335a-16: skyes bu dam pa rin po che //
T04TD3936E:335a-17: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-18: rang bzhin kha na ma tho dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-19: bdud la shin tu dpa' ba yi //
T04TD3936E:335a-20: skyes mchog de ni dge 'dun yin //
T04TD3936E:335a-21: byang chub mchog sems mi ldog dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-22: dbang bcu tshad med yon tan gyis //
T04TD3936E:335a-23: brgyan pa'i yon tan gang tshol ba //
T04TD3936E:335a-24: de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yid //
T04TD3936E:335a-25: de ltar gsum pa skyabs song ba //
T04TD3936E:335a-26: 'jigs pa rnams las srung byed pa //
T04TD3936E:335a-27: dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs ldan pa //
T04TD3936E:335a-28: de phyir mi 'jigs sbyin bdag yin //
T04TD3936E:335a-29: skyabs song bsod nams gang yin pa //
T04TD3936E:335a-30: de yi tshad gzung shin tu dka' //
T04TD3936E:335a-31: de ltar skyabs su song ba des //
T04TD3936E:335a-32: byang chub sems ni rin po che //
T04TD3936E:335a-33: bla ma sdom la gnas shing mkhas //
T04TD3936E:335a-34: gzhan gyi don la mngon phyogs shing //
T04TD3936E:335a-35: chos dang zang zing phan 'dogs la //
T04TD3936E:335a-36: gsol ba btab la blang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:335a-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-38: de bzhin bla ma rnams la yang //
T04TD3936E:335a-39: sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal te //
T04TD3936E:335a-40: ma rtog la sogs dngos po dag / ci 'byor pa yis mchod pa bya //
T04TD3936E:335a-41: yongs su gzung ba med pa dang //
T04TD3936E:335a-42: kun du bzang po'i gzhung bzhin du //
T04TD3936E:335a-43: blos sprul pa yis mchod pa bya //
T04TD3936E:335a-44: sdig bshags pa dang rjes yi rang //
T04TD3936E:335a-45: gsol ba gdab dang yongs bsngo bya //
T04TD3936E:335a-46: nyi zla lta bu'i byang chub sems //
T04TD3936E:335a-47: lan gsum par du blang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:335a-48: sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur na //
T04TD3936E:335a-49: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed na //
T04TD3936E:335a-50: kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che //
T04TD3936E:335a-51: 'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog / byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //
T04TD3936E:335a-52: gal te de la gzags mchis na //
T04TD3936E:335a-53: nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste //
T04TD3936E:335b-0: de ni de las lhag par @335b 'gyur ;
T04TD3936E:335b-2: yid bzhin nor bu'i sems skye ba //
T04TD3936E:335b-3: rgyu med ma yin gyi na ma yin gyi //
T04TD3936E:335b-4: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la //
T04TD3936E:335b-5: dad dad dang ba bskyed nas sems skye'o //
T04TD3936E:335b-6: de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang //
T04TD3936E:335b-7: bdag la bde dang grags dang snyan phyir min //
T04TD3936E:335b-8: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus bsal bya'i phyir //
T04TD3936E:335b-9: 'jig rten phan par byed pa'i sems skye'o //
T04TD3936E:335b-10: rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun la //
T04TD3936E:335b-11: dad pa'i sgo nas gus par mchod pa dang //
T04TD3936E:335b-12: bla ma gus par mchod cing sems skye'o //
T04TD3936E:335b-13: byang chub sems ni rin chen gang yod pa //
T04TD3936E:335b-14: mi nyams pa srung zhing yang dag spel bar bya //
T04TD3936E:335b-15: yon tan phan 'dogs sdug bsngal gyur pa la //
T04TD3936E:335b-16: ci 'byor pa yi bza' dang btung la sogs //
T04TD3936E:335b-17: re ba med par gus pas gtang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:335b-18: 'jigs pas nyen pa'i sems can bskyab pa dang //
T04TD3936E:335b-19: mun nang 'thoms pa'i skye bo mig med la //
T04TD3936E:335b-20: chos kyi sbyin pa gus par gtang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:335b-21: lus dang sems ni 'khrugs pa'i sems can la //
T04TD3936E:335b-22: g-yog dang sman gyi sbyin pas gus par bya //
T04TD3936E:335b-23: phyi dang nang gi dngos po thams cad dag / sems can kun la ma lus gtang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:335b-24: yon tan ma lus dag ni gang yin pa //
T04TD3936E:335b-25: de dag thams cad sbyin pa la sogs te //
T04TD3936E:335b-26: bsod nams phung po gzhal dka' dpag tu med //
T04TD3936E:335b-27: len la re ba med par sbyin pa yongs gtong ba //
T04TD3936E:335b-28: nor rnams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te //
T04TD3936E:335b-29: bang mdzod dag ni rin chen 'thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:335b-30: sbyin la the tshom med par gus par gtong ba dag / sangs rgyas byang chub yun mi ring bar 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:335b-31: bde bar gyur pa dag ni thams cad kyi //
T04TD3936E:335b-32: rgyu yi gtso bo sbyin par dam pas gsungs //
T04TD3936E:335b-33: bde ba rgya chen rgyu yi sbyin pa 'di //
T04TD3936E:335b-34: byed par 'dod las mi rtog rnal 'byor dang //
T04TD3936E:335b-35: sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed //
T04TD3936E:335b-36: longs spyod rnams ni mi rtag mthong gyur cing //
T04TD3936E:335b-37: snying rje chen po rang gi dad gyur na //
T04TD3936E:335b-38: sbyin bdag gi khyim gzhan dang gzhan gyi bar //
T04TD3936E:335b-39: shin tu rigs pa'i tshul 'di rtogs gyur la //
T04TD3936E:335b-40: gang byin de la 'jigs pa skye mi 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:335b-41: khyim na gang bzhag de la 'jigs pa 'byung //
T04TD3936E:335b-42: byin pas 'jig rten pha rol bde ba 'grub //
T04TD3936E:335b-43: ma byin tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal skyed //
T04TD3936E:336a-0: ma yi nor rnams skar mda'i rang @336a * //
T04TD3936E:336a-2: ma byin nor rnams mi rtag med 'gyur te //
T04TD3936E:336a-3: byin pas rtag tu mi zad gter du 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:336a-4: sems can phan par sems pa gang yin pa'i //
T04TD3936E:336a-5: nor rnams snying po med pa yod par 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:336a-6: gang zhig yongs su gtong ba mkhas pas bsngags //
T04TD3936E:336a-7: skye bo byis pa de dag sogs la dga' //
T04TD3936E:336a-8: yongs su bzung bas mi 'bral gang yang med //
T04TD3936E:336a-9: byin pas rtag tu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung //
T04TD3936E:336a-10: gang zhig byin pa de ni lam gyi mchog / ma byin khyim du bzhag pa de ni nyon mongs skye //
T04TD3936E:336a-11: slong ba sngon du 'ongs na rgyal sras des //
T04TD3936E:336a-12: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs ni spel ba'i phyir //
T04TD3936E:336a-13: ltos pa med par yongs su gtang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:336a-14: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'du shes de la bskyed //
T04TD3936E:336a-15: gang zhig zang zing nor la chags byed pa //
T04TD3936E:336a-16: de la byang chub sems mchog skye ba med //
T04TD3936E:336a-17: sems mchog de ni skyon dang ma 'grogs te //
T04TD3936E:336a-18: rgya mtsho chen po ro dang mi 'grogs bzhin //
T04TD3936E:336a-19: de bas rtag tu skyon rnams kun spangs te //
T04TD3936E:336a-20: byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu thams cad sbyin //
T04TD3936E:336a-21: yon tan mnga' ba mtha' yas 'phags pa'i nor //
T04TD3936E:336a-22: nor gzhan phal pa sdug bsngal rgyu //
T04TD3936E:336a-23: bdog mang dag gis ci zhig bya //
T04TD3936E:336a-24: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin //
T04TD3936E:336a-25: chog shes med par dbul por gsungs //
T04TD3936E:336a-26: sbyin pa de ni byang chub rtsa ba ste //
T04TD3936E:336a-27: zhum pa brtsal la sbyin pa gtang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:336a-28: de ltar sbyin la gus dang ldan par gyur pa des //
T04TD3936E:336a-29: dran dang ldan zhing shes bzhin bag yod pas //
T04TD3936E:336a-30: dbang po'i sgo rnams rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T04TD3936E:336a-31: gang zhig lus ngag yid kyi las //
T04TD3936E:336a-32: thams cad legs par yongs brtags te //
T04TD3936E:336a-33: bdag dang gzhan la phan shes nas //
T04TD3936E:336a-34: rtag tu byed pa de mkhas pa //
T04TD3936E:336a-35: mi gsod pa dang rku spong dang //
T04TD3936E:336a-36: gzhan gyi chung ma spong ba dang //
T04TD3936E:336a-37: brdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub dang //
T04TD3936E:336a-38: ma 'brel smra ba yang dag sdom //
T04TD3936E:336a-39: brnab sems gnod sems log lta spang //
T04TD3936E:336a-40: 'di dag spangs las dkar bcu ste //
T04TD3936E:336a-41: las lam bcu las nyams mi bya //
T04TD3936E:336a-43: mdor bsdus tshul khrims yin par gsungs //
T04TD3936E:336a-44: tshul rnams ma lus 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pas //
T04TD3936E:336a-45: de phyir tshul khrims bsrung la brtson par bya //
T04TD3936E:336a-46: nang gi sems ni dul gyur na //
T04TD3936E:336b-0: phyi yi dgra @336b 'dis gnod mi nus //
T04TD3936E:336b-1: nang gi sems ni g-yo ba na //
T04TD3936E:336b-2: phyi yi dgra 'dis rkyen byas te //
T04TD3936E:336b-3: nang gi dgra 'dis lus sems bsreg / de phyir nang gi dgra 'di gzhom //
T04TD3936E:336b-4: yon tan ma lus byang chub sems las 'byung //
T04TD3936E:336b-5: byang chub sems mchog snying rje'i rgyud las byung //
T04TD3936E:336b-6: de las snying rje'i ngang tshul ldan par bya //
T04TD3936E:336b-7: dge sbyong tshul la gnas byas nas //
T04TD3936E:336b-8: de yis mi mthun phyogs spang bya //
T04TD3936E:336b-9: de la mi mthun gang zhe na //
T04TD3936E:336b-11: bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-12: mi mthun rnyed pa kun du tshol //
T04TD3936E:336b-13: rnyed pas rnyed pa tshol byed dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-14: dad pas byin pa chud gson dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-16: bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes //
T04TD3936E:336b-17: gzhan la phrag dog ser sna byed //
T04TD3936E:336b-18: gzhan gyi rnyed pa 'dod par byed //
T04TD3936E:336b-19: bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rtog par byed //
T04TD3936E:336b-20: so sor thar pa'i 'dul mi bsrung //
T04TD3936E:336b-21: khva ltar mu cor smra ba dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-22: ma gus rgod khengs lta ba ngan la zhen pa dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-23: 'khor ba la ni dga' ba dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-24: mya ngan 'das la rgyab phyogs dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-25: zab mo'i chos ni spong ba dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-26: dkon mchog gsum la ma gus dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-27: bla ma khyad du gsod pa ste //
T04TD3936E:336b-28: brtags te legs par spang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:336b-29: de ltar tshul khrims srung byed na //
T04TD3936E:336b-30: sngon chad mi shes skye bo thams cad kyang //
T04TD3936E:336b-31: tshul khrims ldan pa'i skye bo de la 'dud //
T04TD3936E:336b-32: tshul khrims rtag tu ldan pa'i mi //
T04TD3936E:336b-33: bde ba nas ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:336b-34: de ltar tshul khrims rgyan dang ldan pa des //
T04TD3936E:336b-35: bdud kyi las rnams yongs su spong ba dang //
T04TD3936E:336b-36: bzod pa dga' zhing yang dag gnas par bya //
T04TD3936E:336b-37: bzod pa shin tu phan pa sgrub byed pa //
T04TD3936E:336b-38: de la su zhig nan tan mi byed yod //
T04TD3936E:336b-39: chos tshol ba dang gzhan don byed pa la //
T04TD3936E:336b-40: bzod pa'i go chas mi 'khrugs mtsho ltar bya //
T04TD3936E:336b-41: gzhan don 'dod pa'i yid dang ldan pa la //
T04TD3936E:336b-42: tshul khrims dam pa bzod pa zhes bya gsungs //
T04TD3936E:336b-43: gnod pa skye med tshul du rab mthong ba //
T04TD3936E:336b-44: de ni bzod pa 'phrul zhes drang srong dam pas gsungs //
T04TD3936E:336b-45: bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongs su dag gyur cing //
T04TD3936E:336b-46: gzugs rigs tshe ring nad med thob byed pa //
T04TD3936E:336b-47: bzod pa'i go cha brtan par su mi byed //
T04TD3936E:337a-0: ji ltar bzod pa'i stobs la @337a * //
T04TD3936E:337a-2: rtag tu dge ba'i las la spro ba byed pa gang //
T04TD3936E:337a-3: de la dge ba'i lo tog gong nas gong du 'phel //
T04TD3936E:337a-4: bshad pas sems can rgyud kun grol //
T04TD3936E:337a-5: ma rig mun sel shes rab bskyed //
T04TD3936E:337a-6: nyan pa byang chub yan lag ste //
T04TD3936E:337a-7: bsam bsgom sa gzhi lta bu ste //
T04TD3936E:337a-8: ma bshad shes pa med pa yin //
T04TD3936E:337a-9: sangs rgyas bstan pa yun thung 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:337a-11: ma nyams bsgom pa'i rten dang 'brel //
T04TD3936E:337a-12: blang bya dor bya mi shes pas //
T04TD3936E:337a-13: gzings spangs rgya mtsho brgal ba bzhin //
T04TD3936E:337a-14: rtsol bas nan tan ma byas na //
T04TD3936E:337a-15: shing las me 'byung mi srid bzhin //
T04TD3936E:337a-16: bsgom sgrub nan tan ma byas par //
T04TD3936E:337a-18: rgyud la 'bad par ma byas par //
T04TD3936E:337a-19: bla med byang chub mi 'byung ste //
T04TD3936E:337a-20: dper na zhi ba'i las dang mtshungs //
T04TD3936E:337a-21: chos sku rgyu la rag las phyir //
T04TD3936E:337a-22: gsang sngags man ngag thabs chen gyis //
T04TD3936E:337a-24: smra zhing tshogs rnams ma bsags na //
T04TD3936E:337a-25: bskal pa brgyar yang mi 'grub po //
T04TD3936E:337a-26: thabs kyis 'grub ces lta ba la //
T04TD3936E:337a-27: nan tan mi byed gang zag ni //
T04TD3936E:337a-28: gal te log par rtogs gyur na //
T04TD3936E:337a-29: gru med rgya mtsho rgal ba bzhin //
T04TD3936E:337a-30: rnal 'byor mngon sum ma gyur pa //
T04TD3936E:337a-31: rlabs chen spyod pa byed gyur pa //
T04TD3936E:337a-32: kha na ma tho ltung 'gyur te //
T04TD3936E:337a-33: g-yang sa chen por 'jug pa bzhin //
T04TD3936E:337a-34: de ltar thos bsam sgom pa la //
T04TD3936E:337a-35: brtson par byas nas tshogs rdzogs 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:337a-36: sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis spangs te //
T04TD3936E:337a-37: byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:337a-38: de ltar brtson dang ldan pa des ;
T04TD3936E:337a-39: / dben pa la ni dga' bar 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:337a-40: don med rnam par slu ba yi //
T04TD3936E:337a-41: 'jig rten chos la ma chags par //
T04TD3936E:337a-42: nags tshal la sogs dben pa ru //
T04TD3936E:337a-43: sems nyid gdod nas ma skyes pa'i //
T04TD3936E:337a-44: rang 'byung dgon pa yin mod kyi //
T04TD3936E:337a-45: las dang po yi sems can gyis //
T04TD3936E:337a-46: phyi rol dgon pa thog mar bsten //
T04TD3936E:337a-47: de 'og sems nyid dgon pa btsal //
T04TD3936E:337a-48: der yang dang po byams pa dang //
T04TD3936E:337a-49: snying rje'i sems ni goms par bya //
T04TD3936E:337a-50: mi gtsang keng rus rten 'brel la //
T04TD3936E:337a-51: yid ni mnyam par gzhag par bya //
T04TD3936E:337a-52: sgrib pa lnga ni spang bya zhing //
T04TD3936E:337a-53: bsgom pa med na byang chub kyi //
T04TD3936E:337b-0: rtsa @337b ba med de sgrib mi spong //
T04TD3936E:337b-1: sgrib pa ma spangs sangs rgyas pa //
T04TD3936E:337b-2: grub mtha' kun las yongs ma bstan //
T04TD3936E:337b-3: bzlas pa ma byas lha dang ring //
T04TD3936E:337b-4: dge ba kun la mi 'jug na //
T04TD3936E:337b-5: mnyen pa med pa'i gru bzhin du //
T04TD3936E:337b-6: rgya mtsho'i gting du bying bar 'gyur //
T04TD3936E:337b-7: rnal 'byor nan tan byed gyur kyang //
T04TD3936E:337b-8: dge ba gzhan la mi brtson na //
T04TD3936E:337b-9: shing gcig yal ga med pa las //
T04TD3936E:337b-10: me ni 'bar ba dka' dang mtshungs //
T04TD3936E:337b-11: thos sogs dge ba la brtson bya //
T04TD3936E:337b-12: rnal 'byor nan tan mi byed na //
T04TD3936E:337b-13: mtho ris thob kyang thar pa ring //
T04TD3936E:337b-14: bla med byang chub med pa'i phyir //
T04TD3936E:337b-15: rnal 'byor bsgom la spyod med na //
T04TD3936E:337b-16: grogs dang bral nas lam zhugs bzhin //
T04TD3936E:337b-17: dgra dang chom rkun byung ba na //
T04TD3936E:337b-18: bzlog par mi nus grogs med bzhin //
T04TD3936E:337b-19: mi lus thob pa 'ang ches dka' na //
T04TD3936E:337b-20: dam chos phrad pa'ang de bas dka' //
T04TD3936E:337b-21: mi lus dal 'byor thob pa la //
T04TD3936E:337b-22: mkhas pa dam chos mi nyan pa //
T04TD3936E:337b-23: rin chen rnyed nas slar dor bzhin /
T04TD3936E:337b-24: dam pa'i chos la ma zhugs par //
T04TD3936E:337b-25: don med yal bar mi 'dug go //
T04TD3936E:337b-26: bla med theg chen rnyed gyur nas //
T04TD3936E:337b-27: de la nan tan mi byed na //
T04TD3936E:337b-28: rin chen rnyed nas byi dor dang //
T04TD3936E:337b-29: mi byed dor ba dag dang mtshungs //
T04TD3936E:337b-30: mi lus dal 'byor thob pa dag / yid bzhin nor bu dag dang mtshungs //
T04TD3936E:337b-31: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ni //
T04TD3936E:337b-32: yon tan kun gyi 'byung khungs te //
T04TD3936E:337b-33: byi dor byas na de las ni //
T04TD3936E:337b-35: de ltar dal 'byor thob nas ni //
T04TD3936E:337b-36: thar pa'i lam la 'jug par bya //
T04TD3936E:337b-37: nad dang mthun pa'i sman pa bsten //
T04TD3936E:337b-38: de ltar yun ring bsgom gyur na //
T04TD3936E:337b-39: lus sems las su rung ba dang //
T04TD3936E:337b-40: mngon shes lnga la sogs pa thob //
T04TD3936E:337b-41: de ltar zhi gnas goms gyur pa'i //
T04TD3936E:337b-42: yon tan ma lus kun gyi rgyu //
T04TD3936E:337b-43: stong pa nyid la 'jug par bya //
T04TD3936E:337b-44: lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos //
T04TD3936E:337b-45: dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya //
T04TD3936E:337b-46: rang gzhan gnyi ga rgyu med las //
T04TD3936E:337b-47: dngos po gang yang 'byung med pa //
T04TD3936E:337b-48: rang gzhan gnyi ga rgyu med las //
T04TD3936E:337b-50: yod dang med las skye ba med pas na //
T04TD3936E:337b-51: skye ba med cing gang yang 'gag pa med //
T04TD3936E:337b-52: dngos po rang bzhin ma skyes stong pa nyid //
T04TD3936E:337b-53: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa //
T04TD3936E:337b-54: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T04TD3936E:337b-55: stong pa nyid du mi bsgom ste //
T04TD3936E:338a-2: stong dang mi stong 'dzin pa la //
T04TD3936E:338a-3: tha mal pa yi rnam rtog skye //
T04TD3936E:338a-4: stong pa zhes pa'i rnam rtog ste //
T04TD3936E:338a-5: des na de nyid spang bar bya //
T04TD3936E:338a-6: 'ga' yang mthong ba med pa ni //
T04TD3936E:338a-7: mthong ba'i mchog ces yin par gsungs //
T04TD3936E:338a-8: dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni //
T04TD3936E:338a-9: gzugs brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa yin //
T04TD3936E:338a-10: so so skye bo la gsungs pa //
T04TD3936E:338a-11: gang yin de ni zab pa'i chos //
T04TD3936E:338a-12: 'jig rten sgyu ma lta bu nyid //
T04TD3936E:338a-13: sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yin //
T04TD3936E:338a-14: ji ltar sgyu ma'i glang po la //
T04TD3936E:338a-15: skye dang 'jig rten snang mod kyi //
T04TD3936E:338a-16: de ltar brtags na yang dag tu //
T04TD3936E:338a-17: skye dang 'jig pa med pa ltar ;
T04TD3936E:338a-19: skye dang 'jig pa nyid snang yang //
T04TD3936E:338a-20: dam pa'i don du brtags byas na //
T04TD3936E:338a-21: skye dang 'jig pa yod ma yin //
T04TD3936E:338a-22: dngos po 'di dag thams cad ni //
T04TD3936E:338a-23: rtag tu ma skyes ma 'gags nyid //
T04TD3936E:338a-24: yang dag don la rnal 'byor bya //
T04TD3936E:338a-25: bying rgod dbang du mi 'gro bar /
T04TD3936E:338a-26: zhi gnas lhag mthong cha mnyam mo //
T04TD3936E:338a-27: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid la //
T04TD3936E:338a-28: shes rab mig gis blta bar bya //
T04TD3936E:338a-29: de nyid mthong nas yon tan skye //
T04TD3936E:338a-30: nags sogs dus kyis bsgyur ba med //
T04TD3936E:338a-31: 'dus byas mi rtag stong par ston //
T04TD3936E:338a-32: nags sogs rgyu 'bras so so yis //
T04TD3936E:338a-33: kun rdzob slu ba med pa ston ;
T04TD3936E:338a-34: / ro dang rus pa chu shing sogs //
T04TD3936E:338a-35: phyi nang chos kun bdag med ston //
T04TD3936E:338a-36: kun la khyab pa'i nam mkha' yis //
T04TD3936E:338a-37: don dam spros bral la sogs ston //
T04TD3936E:338a-38: rang bzhin yongs su shes pa yis //
T04TD3936E:338a-39: de tshe yul ni snang na yang //
T04TD3936E:338a-40: sgyu ma bzhin te gos pa med //
T04TD3936E:338a-41: don dam rang bzhin rtogs gyur na //
T04TD3936E:338a-42: tha snyad dag gis ci zhig bya //
T04TD3936E:338a-43: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya //
T04TD3936E:338a-44: grogs mchog rnyed na shin tu legs //
T04TD3936E:338a-45: de ltar min na gcig pur gnas //
T04TD3936E:338a-46: bla ma sangs rgyas dngos 'dra la //
T04TD3936E:338a-47: yo byad kyis ni bsnyen bkur dang //
T04TD3936E:338a-48: lus ngag sems kyi bkur sti ni //
T04TD3936E:338a-49: dus gsum kun du bya ba yin //
T04TD3936E:338a-50: bla ma bsnyen bkur ma byas na //
T04TD3936E:338a-51: sangs rgyas spangs te dam tshig nyams //
T04TD3936E:338a-52: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs //
T04TD3936E:338a-53: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung //
T04TD3936E:338a-54: skyon ni rnam yang bsam mi bya //
T04TD3936E:338a-55: yon tan bzung na dngos grub thob //
T04TD3936E:338a-56: skyon rnams bzung na dngos mi thob //
T04TD3936E:338b-0: @338b de bzhin tshe ni thung ba dang //
T04TD3936E:338b-2: slob dpon smod par byed pa ni //
T04TD3936E:338b-3: nya pa la sogs rigs su skye //
T04TD3936E:338b-4: nyes pa thams cad byed 'gyur yang //
T04TD3936E:338b-5: mkhas pas bla ma smad mi bya //
T04TD3936E:338b-6: chos 'dod pas ni rtag par yang //
T04TD3936E:338b-7: slob dpon rab tu mgu bar bya //
T04TD3936E:338b-8: gser ni stong phrag brgya nyid dang //
T04TD3936E:338b-9: rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T04TD3936E:338b-10: ras ni zung brgya dbul bar bya //
T04TD3936E:338b-11: de ltar bla ma mnyes byas nas //
T04TD3936E:338b-12: mi dge las las ldog bya zhing //
T04TD3936E:338b-13: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
T04TD3936E:338b-14: the tshom med pa nyid dang ni //
T04TD3936E:338b-15: bka' bzhin du ni gus par bsgrub //
T04TD3936E:338b-16: de ltar mi byed gang zag ni //
T04TD3936E:338b-17: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las 'di skad du /
T04TD3936E:338b-18: bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni //
T04TD3936E:338b-19: ci ste mngon par brtson byas kyang //
T04TD3936E:338b-20: gang zag bzhis ni 'jig rten du //
T04TD3936E:338b-22: byang chub sems ni ma bskyed dang //
T04TD3936E:338b-23: the tshom ldan pa nyid dang ni //
T04TD3936E:338b-24: bka' bzhin du ni mi byed dang //
T04TD3936E:338b-27: mi lus thob pa shin tu dka' //
T04TD3936E:338b-28: 'gro ba'i tshe yang shin tu thung //
T04TD3936E:338b-29: blo gros nyam kyang shin tu chung //
T04TD3936E:338b-30: bshes gnyen mchog kyang rnyed dka' bas //
T04TD3936E:338b-31: byis pa rnams ni don med 'khyam //
T04TD3936E:338b-32: bdag gis gzhung dang mi 'gal bar //
T04TD3936E:338b-33: spyod bsdus sgron ma rin chen phreng //
T04TD3936E:338b-34: theg chen sgor zhugs bya ba dag / gzhung 'di byas pa'i bsod nams des //
T04TD3936E:338b-35: sems can thams cad ma lus pa //
T04TD3936E:338b-36: thub dbang go 'phang thob par shog / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T04TD3936E:338b-37: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3936E:338b-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a ka ra warma dang /
T04TD3936E:338b-40: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
